All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
The Board class represents the game board in a Backgammon game.
BoardTest
 
DoublingCube
The DoublingCube class represents the doubling cube in a Backgammon game.
DoublingCubeTest
 
Game
The Game class represents the main logic and flow of a Backgammon game.
Move
The Move class handles the generation of valid moves for Backgammon checkers based on dice rolls.
PipCount
This class is responsible for calculating the pip count in a game of Backgammon.
Point
This class represents a point on a Backgammon board, extending the functionality of the Triangle class.
PointTest
 
TestFile
This class is responsible for reading and processing actions from a CSV file for a Backgammon game.
TestFile.Action
Enumeration of possible actions that can be read from the test file.
Triangle
Represents a triangle on a Backgammon board.
Triangle.Checker
Enumeration for the types of checkers.
TriangleTest
 
User
Represents a player in the game.
UserTest
